resources.string: Beston Hotel provides a most conducive spot for you to take a break from your busy days. With its location just 1 km from the city center and 10.5 km from the airport, this 4-star hotel ...

Well-placed in the business, restaurants, shopping area of Palembang city, Beston Hotel provides a most conducive spot for you to take a break from your busy days. With its location just 1 km from the city center and 10.5 km from the airport, this 4-star hotel attracts numerous travelers each year. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the citys must-see destinations.
Jl. Jend. Sudirman No. 57, Ilir Timur, Palembang, Indonesia, 30125
Breakfast, Housekeeping, Swimming Pool, Gym Area.
